item.text: We were looking for a very siple WP theme which works well with a couple of plugins: LearnDash and Espresso.

We were looking for a very siple WP theme.
What we needed from our theme is: looks good on mobile, displays GIFs,integrates with a couple of plugins: LearnDash and Espresso (for events registration)
What we needed from our theme is: looks good on mobile, displays GIFs,integrates with a couple of plugins: LearnDash and Espresso (for events registration).
Some free themes I came across:
Some free themes I came across: [http://demo.ninebase.com/6/ Wolf 6]
What we needed from our theme is: looks good on mobile, displays GIFs,integrates with a couple of plugins: LearnDash and Espresso (for events registration). Preferably responsive.
Some free themes I came across: [http://demo.ninebase.com/6/ Wolf 6], [http://modernthemes.net/demo/gridsbywp/ Gridsby] - gallery theme, but can be used for other things.
WHile I was looking for something with decent tpograpy, I came across [https://wordpress.org/plugins/easy-google-fonts/ Google Fonts plugin].
Some free themes I came across: [http://demo.ninebase.com/6/ Wolf 6], and [http://modernthemes.net/demo/gridsbywp/ Gridsby] - gallery theme, but can be used for other things.
We were looking for a very simple WP theme.
What we needed from our theme is: looks good on mobile, displays GIFs, integrates with a couple of plugins: LearnDash and Espresso (for events registration). Preferably responsive.

Some free themes I came across: [http://demo.ninebase.com/6/ Wolf 6], and [http://modernthemes.net/demo/gridsbywp/ Gridsby] - gallery theme, but can be used for other things.I dont know whether gifs will work.
While I was looking for something with decent tpograpy, I came across [https://wordpress.org/plugins/easy-google-fonts/ Google Fonts plugin].

We also had a look at premium affordable themes: [http://themeforest.net/item/krating-full-page-blogging-themes/7162135 Krafting]

story.text: We were looking for a very simple WP theme.
What we needed from our theme is: looks good on mobile, displays GIFs, integrates with a couple of plugins: LearnDash and Espresso (for events registration). Preferably responsive.

Some free themes I came across: [http://demo.ninebase.com/6/ Wolf 6], and [http://modernthemes.net/demo/gridsbywp/ Gridsby] - gallery theme, but can be used for other things.I dont know whether gifs will work.
We also had a look at premium affordable themes: [http://themeforest.net/item/krating-full-page-blogging-themes/7162135 Krafting] and [http://demo.codestag.com/ink/ Ink]
While I was looking for something with decent tpograpy, I came across [https://wordpress.org/plugins/easy-google-fonts/ Google Fonts plugin].
